content: {"name": "N Street Village", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Serves women experiencing homelessness.\n-  Show up and complete a health screening: questions about possible COVID symptoms.\n- Clients also can sign up to use the laundry and shower facilities", "email": "", "url": "https://www.nstreetvillage.org/healthy-meals-basic-needs/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1333 N Street Northwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Northwest Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20005", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9075729, "longitude": -77.0314836}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 939-2076", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:45", "closes_at": "14:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:45", "closes_at": "14:45"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:45", "closes_at": "14:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:45", "closes_at": "14:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:45", "closes_at": "14:45"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "For women and children only"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
